item.title: Trump Wants Putin Meeting to Talk Ukraine, Arms
item.description: President Donald Trump said Thursday that he wants to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin soon and to get the war with Ukraine stopped.

item.title: Rep. Johnson to Newsmax: Let Trump Negotiate Purchase of Panama Canal
item.description: President Donald Trump should be given the opportunity to purchase the Panama Canal, Rep. Dusty Johnson, R-S.D., told Newsmax on Thursday.
